I would recommend "Clerks" as a good choice for those who enjoy movies about everyday life.

"Clerks" tells the story of two clerks named Dante and Randal at a local convenience store.

Throughout the movie, Dante and Randal navigate through various challenges such as difficult customers, store security concerns, and more.

Despite these challenges, Dante and Randal maintain their composure and work together to overcome any obstacles that may come their way.

In addition to these challenges, Dante and Randal also encounter a number of other interesting characters throughout the movie.

Overall, "Clerks" is an excellent choice for those who enjoy movies about everyday life.
